activities: To the extent permitted by applicable law or the EEA and Swiss data protection authorities, Cubic Corporation processes or contemplates processing EEA and Swiss personal data relating to:  (1) current and former employees of its European subsidiaries/affiliates for purposes of global human resources administration and management; (2) representatives and employees of actual and prospective corporate customers and business partners in order to manage business relationships and provide products or contracted services; (3) product end user and prospects to provide service and product information; (4) individuals whose data Cubic Corporation processes on behalf of business customers as a service provider or mere data processor; and (5) its officers, directors, employees, consultants, and staffing agencies and any of those of its European subsidiaries/affiliates for purposes of operating its whistleblower program, investigations, and enforcement of its Code of Ethics and Business Conduct in the EEA and Switzerland.
eucountries: Denmark, Germany, Italy, Lithuania, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Defense Industry Equipment - (DFN)Education & Training - (EDS)Transportation Srvs (Except Aviation) - (TRN)
personaldata: off-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
